short_summary: Sault St. Marie, ON Navigational Dredging
description: The contractor shall perform and complete the Work within 7 (seven) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer (between July 16, 2023 and August 31, 2023).
full_summary:
### St. Marys River Navigational Dredging 2023
#### Request for Proposal
**Reference:** WS4001617182-Doc4005566159
**Solicitation Number:** WS4001617182
**Publication Date:** May 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 12, 2023, 2:00 PM

**Amendment Notice**: Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been revised. Contractors must submit their bids by June 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Project Overview**:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Branch, is seeking proposals for the St. Marys River Navigational Dredging 2023 project in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. The scope of work includes maintenance dredging to re-establish navigational water depths in the St. Marys River and the disposal of dredged material. The contractor is required to complete the project within 7 (seven) weeks from the date of acceptance of the offer, between July 16, 2023, and August 31, 2023.

**Key Details**:

* **Dredging Services**: The project requires the provision of dredging services to maintain navigational water depths in the St. Marys River.
* **Contract Period**: The contract is expected to commence on June 30, 2023, and end on August 31, 2023.
* **Trade Agreements**: The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Operation**: The project will be carried out in Canada, specifically in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region), and Sault Ste. Marie.

**Contract Information**:
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, with a contact person being Sheila Dhanna at sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Important Note**: All contractors must submit their bids in accordance with the revised closing time and requirements outlined in this amendment notice. Failure to do so will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.```markdown
